mapper.select: SELECT s.s_no, s.s_date, s.s_type, s.s_startTime, s.s_endTime, s.s_memo, s.s_doctor, st.s_dept, p.p_name, p.p_no, p.p_phone, p.p_visit, p.p_chart FROM schedule AS s JOIN staff AS st ON s.s_doctor = st.s_name LEFT OUTER JOIN patient AS p ON p.p_name = s.s_patient WHERE s.s_no = #{s_no};
